防空: (ぼうくう) - air defense; air defence
防空壕: (ぼうくうごう) - air-raid shelter; bomb shelter
防空砲: (ぼうくうほう) - air defense artillery; air defence artillery
防総省: (ぼうそうしょう) - Department of Defense (Defence)
防臭剤: (ぼうしゅうざい) - deodorant; deodorizer; deodoriser
防虫: (ぼうちゅう) - protection from insects; insect repellence
防虫網: (ぼうちゅうもう) - insect net; mosquito net
防衛大臣: (ぼうえいだいじん) - Minister of Defense; Minister of Defence
防衛庁: (ぼうえいちょう) - Japan Defense Agency (Defence) (became Japanese Ministry of Defense in Jan. 2007)
防衛庁長官: (ぼうえいちょうちょうかん) - Director General of (former) Defence Agency (Defense)
防衛施設庁: (ぼうえいしせつちょう) - (Japanese) Defense Facilities Administration Agency (Defence)
防衛機構: (ぼうえいきこう) - defence mechanism; defense mechanism
防衛相: (ぼうえいしょう) - Minister of Defense; Minister of Defence
防衛省: (ぼうえいしょう) - Ministry of Defense (formerly Japan Defense Agency)
防衛線: (ぼうえいせん) - line of defence (defense); lines (as in enemy lines, etc.)
防衛能力: (ぼうえいのうりょく) - defense capability; defence capability
防衛計画: (ぼうえいけいかく) - defence program; defence plan
防衛計画の大綱: (ぼうえいけいかくのたいこう) - National Defense Program Outline
防衛費: (ぼうえいひ) - defense costs; defence costs; ERA
防衛部長: (ぼうえいぶちょう) - assistant chief of staff, g3
防護領域: (ぼうごりょういき) - guarded area
防遏手段: (ぼうあつしゅだん) - (yoji) preventive measure
防長官: (ぼうちょうかん) - Secretary of Defence (Defense)
防雨: (ぼうう) - protection against rain; rainproof; raintight
防雪: (ぼうせつ) - anti-snow (device or facility or measure)
防音壁: (ぼうおんへき) - noise barrier; soundproof wall; soundwall; sound barrier
防風: (ぼうふう) - anti-wind (device, facility or measure); Saposhnikovia divaricata (species of umbellifer used in Chinese medicine); Glehnia littoralis (species of umbellifer used in Chinese medicine)
防黴: (ぼうばい) - mold prevention; mildew prevention
防黴剤: (ぼうばいざい) - anti-mold agent; mildew-proofing agent
阻む: (habamu) - impedir alguém de fazer, parar, prevenir, conter, impedir, obstruir, opor-se, frustrar
阻止: (soshi) - obstrução, verificação, impedimento, prevenção, obstáculo, interdição, apreensão, bloqueio
阿うん: (アウン) - Om (san:)/Aun/syllable representing the primordial trinity of Vishnu, Shiva and Brahma; inspiration and expiration/respiration/alpha and omega
阿しゅく仏: (あしゅくぶつ) - Akshobhya (the immovable buddha)
阿しゅく如来: (あしゅくにょらい) - Akshobhya (one of the Five Wisdom Buddhas)
阿亀: (おかめ) - homely woman (esp. one with a small low nose, high flat forehead, and bulging cheeks)/plain woman; soba in soup with slices of boiled fish paste, shiitake mushrooms, greens, seaweed, etc.
阿亀蕎麦: (おかめそば) - soba in soup with slices of boiled fish paste, shiitake mushrooms, greens, seaweed, etc.
阿仙薬: (あせんやく) - gambir; gambier; catechu; cutch
阿代: (アシロ) - Ophidion asiro (species of cusk eel)
阿候鯛: (アコウダイ) - Matsubara's red rockfish (Sebastes matsubarae); red rockfish/red scorpionfish
阿僧祇: (あそうぎ) - a number so great it can never be counted to (san: asamkhya); 10^56 (or 10^64)
阿兄: (あけい) - elder brother; my dear brother
阿叔: (おとおじ) - uncle (one's father's younger brother)
阿古屋貝: (アコヤガイ) - Marten's pearl oyster (Pinctada fucata martensii); Akoya pearl oyster
阿吽: (アウン) - Om (san:)/Aun/syllable representing the primordial trinity of Vishnu, Shiva and Brahma; inspiration and expiration/respiration/alpha and omega
阿吽の呼吸: (あうんのこきゅう) - the harmonizing, mentally and physically, of two parties engaged in an activity; singing from the same hymn-sheet; dancing to the same beat
阿呆に付ける薬なし: (あほうにつけるくすりなし) - (proverb)  there's no medicine for stupidity
阿呆の三杯汁: (あほうのさんばいじる) - only a fool with no manners asks for another helping more than once; only fools are gluttons
